derivation: or אֲפִיק; from H662 (אָפַק) (in the sense of strength); fortress;
outline:
Aphek or Aphik = "enclosure"
  1. a Canaanite city near Jezreel
  2. a city in territory of Asher
  3. a city northeast of Beirut in Transjordan
strongs_def: Aphek (or Aphik), the name of three places in Palestine
